npcs.name: Aemilia Sevso
utterances: Poison testers, it's been my biggest seller for the past several months.  Of course poison was a close second.

npcs.name: Alypia Damian
utterances: Well, hello there. Aren't you the most precious thing! Want to see what I'm selling? I've many nice things that'd do wonders for your image, and my prices are very fair.

npcs.name: Annia Velithe
utterances: Be swift with your business here.  I'm not here to entertain and amuse you.

npcs.name: Armormaster Ikthar Icehammer
utterances: Please stop embarrassing yourself and purchase a real suit of armor.  Are those rags the best you have?
You can always go with the chain over the vanguard.  It's cheaper, but tell me, will you buy yourself a new life?
What can I do to convince you to walk out of here with that plate mail suit you've been checking out?

npcs.name: Barrius Iacomus
utterances: Ahoy!  Welcome to the Seafarer's Roost.  Name's Barrius, but all these scallywags just call me Bar.  Be sure to mind your manners.  I don't want any more trouble!

npcs.name: Bernice
utterances: I could use another ale for the road anytime now.
Look sir, I had just one ale an hour ago with dinner.

npcs.name: Bruccius Capito
utterances: Helloo there!  Can you feel it?  The wind is changing direction....

npcs.name: Carius Aruns
utterances: A good weapon at your side is the only real friend you'll ever have!

npcs.name: Chonax Bonedancer
utterances: Me likes it when they are scared.  It tastes better that way.
Ripping and tearing, ripping and tearing, ripping and tearing, ripping...

npcs.name: City Registrar Glamis
utterances: Greetings, loyal citizen. I'm the Registrar for the City of Freeport.  When you wish to form a guild within the city, you must bring six members here and pay a nominal fee to the Overlord.

npcs.name: Culdor
utterances: Once we're done, you'll have the strongest armor in all of the city!  I guarantee it!
You need help fixing that pile of junk?  Well it's going to cost you.

npcs.name: Dalal Akilia
utterances: Hello, good friend.  How can I be of service to ye?  Interested in buying an item?  My contacts allow me to get unbelievably low prices on almost any consignment item from anywhere in the world.

npcs.name: Decius Dekarn
utterances: I'm here to buy any of that old armor you may have from Dyric.  Don't worry, I'll give you a reasonable price for it.  I also have some new armor for sale if you are interested.

npcs.name: Dyric Pire
utterances: I don't have time for you. I'm trying to work. If you need armor, find someone more suited to your ... taste.

npcs.name: Fichman
utterances: I haven't that much to drink yet, I got here when... bah I forgot.
Ahhh ... quit your whinin'! I paid ya with my jokes and fine company.
What do you mean ye drank more than I did?

npcs.name: Fisherman Zogz
utterances: Tasty treats, lots of meats.
Treat us badly in Neriak! I laugh now we in same spot!
Nasty scars and boiled tar!  Warriors is what we are!

npcs.name: Foreman Asprenus
utterances: Before you go opening your mouth, remember that I'm a citizen of Freeport.  A rich one at that.

npcs.name: Gladiator Skullgrind
utterances: I love to crush those who think they can speak to me.
The best dreams are the flashbacks of the battlefield.
I've lived this long thanks to my ability to kill.
You'd be surprised how easily skulls burst in my fist.

npcs.name: Harbinger McDannis
utterances: Sure there are smarter races, but none as strong as mine!
Yeah, thats blood on my tunic, don't make me add yours to my collection.

npcs.name: Harbormaster Duskmark
utterances: In spite of the cost of living, it's still quite a popular item.
Hello there, kind adventurer.  My merchandise carries the seal of the Overlord himself!  Go ahead, take a look!

npcs.name: Irena
utterances: Risk is part of the game, play it for all it's worth.

npcs.name: Javvy
utterances: Shove off! Not interested in company. Leave me to my grog.

npcs.name: Jistarr
utterances: Were all the barbarians to be slaughtered, I would call it a mercy killing.
Hard work has never killed anyone, but I have.
You don't have to be cold blooded to be a killer, but it helps.

npcs.name: Josef
utterances: Hey!  A deal is a deal.  Until a better one comes along.
I was never even near the bank.
If winning isn't everything, why do we keep score?
You figured out something that never happened, and so it's all lies!

npcs.name: Kirsteh the Witch
utterances: I'll ask you to leave before I lose my patience and turn your limbs into blackened withered stumps.

npcs.name: Kouryick
utterances: What do you want?  Can't you see I want to be alone?  Wait.  Wait.  Maybe you can help me?

A Seafury ship with some very personal cargo went down off the coast of the Nektulos forest.  I know those Nerius marauders were responsible! I just know it! If you get my cargo back for me, I'd be very grateful.  I'd do it, but I'm so busy.

npcs.name: Kronasoo
utterances: The mind is a terrible thing to waste.  Feeling guilty, are we?
If at first you don't succeed, then you should finally accept the truth that you are a failure.
I do not speak with animals.  Try to understand, will you?
There are no stupid questions, only stupid people.  What was your question again?
Idiots should speak only when spoken to.
I can never understand why stupid people don't choke on their tongues.

npcs.name: Loche V'Lys
utterances: Yes, what is it?  Oh, another one of those adventurers.  If you've got any of that old armor from Kirsteh, give it here and I'll sell you some new armor.

npcs.name: Lollia Parnesius
utterances: Oh, hello there! Perhaps my eyes fail me, but you look like you're handy with a quill. Can you do some scribe work for me?
Oh, Anessa! I've been waiting some time for this message.  I sure hope you weren't taking your sweet time with it.

npcs.name: Marcia Betto
utterances: The stuff's over there.  Just let me know if you find anything you like.
Are you going to buy anything today or am I just wasting my time?  This isn't a museum display you know!

npcs.name: Master Archer Hawkeye Hallard
utterances: Hello there, kind adventurer.  My merchandise carries the seal of the Overlord himself!  Go ahead, take a look!

npcs.name: Mehina
utterances: Ah, to think of all the time I've wasted in this wretched place!
These stone walls don't keep things out; they keep us in!
I don't care what they say.  This town is not much to look at, is it?
There's no place for the elderly in this town.

npcs.name: Melenia Scantus
utterances: No, I didn't say you could look at me or talk to me for that matter.

npcs.name: Moirae Nalascos
utterances: Unless you know of a way to make some quick coin, we have no reason to talk.
The next time that guy leers at me, I'm gonna punch him in the throat.
You can avoid trouble around here as long as you don't make eye contact with anyone.
If you keep bothering me, I'll scream for help!!

npcs.name: Neskavul
utterances: Forgiveness is the first sign of weakness.
The slash of a whip is a good way to get one's attention.
I have found fear is always a good motivator.
Consequences are insignificant compared to how much power one can grasp.
Many things can happen.  Pray that I'm not one of them.
Now that Cazic is gone, we are all that's left to fear.
I don't see what's so bad about the Overlord.  He keeps his subjects in line.

npcs.name: Odyssneu
utterances: Yes, I know you seek what I have access to. Then again, who doesn't?  So what can I help you acquire?

npcs.name: Progenitus
utterances: Are you going to buy anything today or am I just wasting my time?  This isn't a museum display you know!

npcs.name: Putad Bloodrinker
utterances: It would have been fun to be on Luclin when it blew up.  Wheee!
Overlord is the strongest troll ever!  He kill twenty of us troll last week.  Wow!
So many things to kill me, dont know where to start.

npcs.name: Ranik Calman
utterances: Aye. Welcome to the Seafarer's Roost. Been out at sea for a while, or just stopping through? Put some coin in my hand and I'll sell ye drinks until ye sail out again.

npcs.name: Rashja
utterances: I can hear breaking bones from many cogs away.
Speak again and I will split your skull in two.
I travel. As long as its to inflict pain.

npcs.name: Renny Parvat
utterances: What are you looking at?   Stay away from me, and keep your hands off my collections, you scumbag!

What collections?  What do you mean, "What collections?" My collections, you fool! If you think you're going to get them from me, you're wrong!   But if you have something to donate, then maybe we can talk.
This is a decent find, I suppose. I can give you a small reward for it.

npcs.name: Rumdum
utterances: What in Zek do you want?  Can't ya see I'm drinkin' here...

npcs.name: Salonia Siculus
utterances: Welcome friend of the Overlord,  please look around.  We have several pieces from the Citadel itself!

npcs.name: Sergeant Typhoeus
utterances: It's hard to impress the Overlord. Trust me, I know.

npcs.name: Sirraw Swiftpaw
utterances: I'm Sirraw Swiftpaw of the Seafuries. I know everything important that happens in this city. I know nothing of you, therefore you're not important. Leave!

npcs.name: Skaznik
utterances: Hello there, kind adventurer.  My merchandise carries the seal of the Overlord himself!  Go ahead, take a look!
Hello! Can I offer you one of our new lifetime extended warranties for any merchandise you purchase?

npcs.name: Slaughtergrott the Vigilant
utterances: Exciting journeys at sea!  See the new world!
You're of no use to me. You're incapable of finding what I need.

npcs.name: Syrinis H`Gez
utterances: Who does that Overlord think he is anyway?
Shove off, mate!
I don't want to be seen talking to you.  Bad for the image, you know?
I gotta get into the Militia.  Then I could legally beat up people.
I'm a dual-breed, not a half-elf.  If you call me half-elf again, I'll cut YOU in half!

npcs.name: Tarragar Caroom
utterances: Hello there, kind adventurer.  My merchandise carries the seal of the Overlord himself!  Go ahead, take a look!
Are you going to buy anything today or am I just wasting my time?  This isn't a museum display you know!

npcs.name: Thanatos Kividius
utterances: If I had another five or six ales, maybe I wouldn't mind talking to you.
Knowing the right people will keep you safe in this city.  You aren't one of them.
Is it even possible for this city to get more corrupt?
Do I look like someone who cares?

npcs.name: Urania Helvonius
utterances: If I ruled this city, there would be statues of me EVERYWHERE!
One day I'll be famous and everyone here will be sorry they ignored me.
I already stuck three people today.  Do you want to be the one to make it four?
Whoa!!!  I don't remember saying I wanted to talk to you!

npcs.name: Uthngar
utterances: Would you like to see all of the colors that the suits come in?  I think we have a lavender leather suit in the back.
You can always go with the chain over the vanguard.  It's cheaper, but tell me, will you buy yourself a new life?
Please stop embarrassing yourself and purchase a real suit of armor.  Are those rags the best you have?

npcs.name: Vhishall
utterances: Please don't touch anything.  This isn't a museum. If you break it, you buy it!

npcs.name: Viducius Festus
utterances: Hello there, kind adventurer.  My merchandise carries the seal of the Overlord himself!  Go ahead, take a look!
Are you going to buy anything today or am I just wasting my time?  This isn't a museum display you know!
In spite of the cost of living, it's still quite a popular item.

npcs.name: Yohance
utterances: The ratonga are intended to teach us that not everything in nature has a purpose.
The trouble with ratonga is they've got no tact.
For Thule's sake!  What is it?

npcs.name: Zizwold
utterances: Finally! You've arrived!  Take this and go quickly!  Remember, gather the items exactly as I've specified on the list!  Do not compromise with the quality!  Now, I don't want to hear anything about payment until you've returned!
